about_the_game:
SECT is a thrilling movement shooter set in 1996 Phoenix, Arizona.

The retro FPS incorporates modern quality of life features while sticking to traditional ideals: satisfying shooting, running, and jumping.

﹏﹏﹏ welcome to my website ﹏﹏﹏

  • A rapidly growing local group has incredible influence over Phoenix. Its reach will expand into your home. You will pursue them and opt them out of being alive.

  • Slick movement served with extra satisfaction. Action is exaggerated - over the top. An emphasis on environmental storytelling and music to build tension.

  • Scavenge level-unique improvised weapons or use familiar small arms. Seek occult iconography amidst Memphis design.

  • Levels feature dynamic selections of Earth's brutalist architecture, unbuilt monuments, Sonoran desert, incomprehensible cosmic horror, and more.

  • Experience the freedom of kickable garbage, functioning trams and climbable geometry. Explore taboo features such as 'offline gameplay' and 'perpetual license'.

  • SECT runs on the Sect Framework, which uses Godot to offer a lightweight, modular and ethical FPS engine well suited to mods and custom user generated content.
